name: League of Pixels
description:
League of Pixels is currently in Alpha. We will be launching into open Beta hopefully very soon.

When Finished this game will include dozens of different 8-bit crew members for collecting and using to both defend your base as well as attack others and embark on campaigns. With already more than 26 crew we hope to keep adding more, from cowboys and generals, to robots and armored fish. Each has there own powers, stack them to make your team ready for any assault.

Buy Buildings and place as desired. Special packs, crew and buildings can be obtained by making contracts with agencies to help progress your power.

Build armories to equip new weapon types

Garages for building raid vehicles for attacking other players bases.

Summon Titan crew to dominate campaigns and make immortal defenses.
